name: Olli & Lissa II
overview: In the second game of the series, Olli and Lisa's friend Arabella the fairy has made a cake that due to a spell error has exploded, and strewn 16 objects all over Olli and Lisa's castle. Arabella needs to go out and find all the objects and return them to their original locations. The player has to navigate this platform game, picking up keys to open doors to find the objects. Nasties abound, and colliding with them will result in the loss of one of three lives.
